name.description: A unique identifier that conforms to the Unity Package Manager naming convention, which uses reverse domain name notation

description.description: A brief description of the package

displayName.description: A user-friendly name to appear in the UnityEditor

unityRelease.description: Part of Unity version indicating the specific release of Unity that the package is compatible with.

changelogUrl.description: Custom location for this package's changelog specified as a URL

dependencies.description: A map of package dependencies. Keys are package names and values are specific versions.

documentationUrl.description: Custom location for this package's documentation specified as a URL

hideInEditor.description: Use this to control whether of not Unity will display this package

keywords.description: An array of keywords used by the Package Manager search API

license.description: Identifier for an OSS license using the SPDX identifier format, or a string such as "See LICENSE.md file".

licenseUrl.description: Custom location for this package's license specified as a URL

samples.description: List of samples included in the package

displayName.description: The name to display in the UI for the sample

description.description: A brief description of the sample

path.description: The path to the sample in the format 'Samples~/<sample-subfolder>
